audioText: Tu détruis alternativement les objets précieux de la collection familiale, créant une ombre de tristesse sur les souvenirs de nos ancêtres.
question: What effect does the destruction have on family memories?
options: You alternately destroy precious objects from the family collection, casting a shadow of sadness over our ancestors' memories
The destruction actually preserves the family memories better
You are carefully preserving all the family objects
The family collection is growing larger with new additions
explanation: The text states 'Tu détruis alternativement les objets précieux de la collection familiale, créant une ombre de tristesse sur les souvenirs de nos ancêtres' - You alternately destroy precious objects from the family collection, creating a shadow of sadness over the memories of our ancestors. 'Détruis' is second person singular present of 'détruire' (to destroy), with missing adverb 'alternativement' (alternately) and noun 'ombre' (shadow).
